overview: In part 2 of “Nuclear Strength Apologetics”, Dr. Jason Lisle continues his compelling presentation of why it is necessary to use a presuppositional method of apologetics in defending the Christian faith. He shows the proper use of evidence in our apologetics and examines weak arguments that Christians sometimes use. Dr. Lisle concludes by answering critics and urging viewers to learn the foolproof persuppositional method for defending the truth of God’s Word!
tagline: A Practical Procedure for Defending the Christian Faith
title: Nuclear Strength Apologetics, Part 2
